models.kpiSummary: Compact KPI metrics displayed at the top of the Toolbox page.
models.aiModels: Open-source AI models developed during the program, each with GitHub repository.
models.studies: Research documents and analyses produced by partners like Briter.
models.bestPractices: Best practices reports from each hackathon event.
models.finalReport: The comprehensive final program report from Digital Africa.

relationships: AI Models are linked to the Hackathon where they were developed
AI Models are tagged with Sector and Country for filtering
Best Practices reports are linked to their source Hackathon
Studies are produced by Partner organizations

aiModels.name: AgriYield Predictor
aiModels.shortDescription: ML model predicting crop yields from weather and soil data.
aiModels.fullDescription: Machine learning model for predicting crop yields based on weather patterns, soil composition, and historical harvest data across Sub-Saharan Africa. Trained on 5 years of agricultural data from Kenya and Nigeria.
aiModels.useCase: Helps farmers and agricultural cooperatives plan planting schedules and optimize resource allocation based on predicted yields.

aiModels.name: HealthTriage AI
aiModels.shortDescription: NLP symptom checker for community health workers.
aiModels.fullDescription: Natural Language Processing model trained on African health data to assist community health workers with patient triage. Supports English, Swahili, and French inputs.
aiModels.useCase: Enables community health workers in rural areas to perform preliminary patient assessments and prioritize cases for clinic referral.

aiModels.name: FinCheck Credit Scorer
aiModels.shortDescription: Alternative credit scoring using mobile money patterns.
aiModels.fullDescription: Credit scoring model that analyzes mobile money transaction patterns to provide credit scores for individuals without traditional banking history. Designed for financial inclusion.
aiModels.useCase: Microfinance institutions can assess creditworthiness of unbanked populations using mobile money data.

aiModels.name: EduMatch Tutor
aiModels.shortDescription: Adaptive learning system matching students to content.
aiModels.fullDescription: Recommendation engine that matches students to educational content based on learning style, pace, and knowledge gaps. Optimized for low-bandwidth environments.
aiModels.useCase: EdTech platforms can personalize learning paths for students in resource-constrained settings.

aiModels.name: WaterSense Monitor
aiModels.shortDescription: IoT water quality prediction from sensor data.
aiModels.fullDescription: Predictive model for water quality assessment using IoT sensor data. Detects contamination risks and predicts maintenance needs for water infrastructure.
aiModels.useCase: Municipal water authorities can proactively address water quality issues before they affect communities.
aiModels.technicalRequirements: Python 3.9+, TensorFlow, compatible with Arduino sensors

aiModels.name: LogiRoute Optimizer
aiModels.shortDescription: Last-mile delivery route optimization for African cities.
aiModels.fullDescription: Route optimization algorithm designed for the unique challenges of African urban logistics: informal addresses, traffic patterns, and road conditions.
aiModels.useCase: Delivery companies can reduce fuel costs and delivery times in cities with complex road networks.

aiModels.name: CropDoc Vision
aiModels.shortDescription: Computer vision for plant disease detection.
aiModels.fullDescription: Image classification model that identifies crop diseases from smartphone photos. Trained on African crop varieties including cassava, maize, and beans.
aiModels.useCase: Farmers can diagnose plant diseases early by taking photos with their smartphones.

aiModels.name: MalariaScreen AI
aiModels.shortDescription: Automated malaria detection from blood smear images.
aiModels.fullDescription: Deep learning model for detecting malaria parasites in microscope blood smear images. Achieves 95% accuracy comparable to expert microscopists.
aiModels.useCase: Rural clinics can perform rapid malaria screening without specialist staff.
aiModels.technicalRequirements: Python 3.9+, PyTorch, GPU recommended for training

aiModels.name: AgriPrice Forecast
aiModels.shortDescription: Market price prediction for agricultural commodities.
aiModels.fullDescription: Time series forecasting model for agricultural commodity prices in African markets. Helps farmers decide optimal selling times.
aiModels.useCase: Farmers and traders can make informed decisions about when to sell crops based on price predictions.

aiModels.name: InsureTech Risk
aiModels.shortDescription: Micro-insurance risk assessment for smallholder farmers.
aiModels.fullDescription: Risk assessment model for agricultural micro-insurance products. Uses satellite imagery and weather data to assess crop insurance risks.
aiModels.useCase: Insurance providers can offer affordable crop insurance to smallholder farmers.

aiModels.name: LanguageLearn NLP
aiModels.shortDescription: Local language learning assistant with speech recognition.
aiModels.fullDescription: NLP model supporting African language learning with speech recognition for Swahili, Yoruba, and Amharic.
aiModels.useCase: Language learning apps can offer courses in African languages with pronunciation feedback.

aiModels.name: SolarPredict Energy
aiModels.shortDescription: Solar energy output forecasting for mini-grids.
aiModels.fullDescription: Forecasting model for solar energy production in off-grid installations. Helps optimize battery storage and load management.
aiModels.useCase: Mini-grid operators can better manage energy distribution and storage.

aiModels.name: TrafficFlow Predict
aiModels.shortDescription: Urban traffic prediction for African megacities.
aiModels.fullDescription: Traffic flow prediction model trained on data from Lagos, Nairobi, and Cairo. Accounts for informal transport and unpredictable patterns.
aiModels.useCase: City planners and navigation apps can provide better routing in African cities.

aiModels.name: FraudGuard Mobile
aiModels.shortDescription: Mobile money fraud detection system.
aiModels.fullDescription: Real-time fraud detection for mobile money transactions. Identifies suspicious patterns while minimizing false positives.
aiModels.useCase: Mobile money operators can protect users from fraudulent transactions.

aiModels.name: MaternalHealth Monitor
aiModels.shortDescription: Risk prediction for maternal health complications.
aiModels.fullDescription: Predictive model for identifying high-risk pregnancies in low-resource settings. Uses basic health metrics available at rural clinics.
aiModels.useCase: Community health workers can identify high-risk pregnancies for specialist referral.

aiModels.name: LivestockHealth Vision
aiModels.shortDescription: Computer vision for livestock disease detection.
aiModels.fullDescription: Image-based disease detection for cattle and poultry. Identifies common diseases from photos of animals.
aiModels.useCase: Pastoralists and farmers can get early warnings about livestock health issues.

aiModels.name: JobMatch Africa
aiModels.shortDescription: Skills-based job matching for informal sector workers.
aiModels.fullDescription: Job recommendation system that matches workers to opportunities based on skills rather than formal credentials.
aiModels.useCase: Job platforms can better serve workers in the informal economy.

aiModels.name: AirQuality Predict
aiModels.shortDescription: Air quality forecasting for urban areas.
aiModels.fullDescription: Air quality prediction model for African cities. Forecasts pollution levels to help vulnerable populations plan outdoor activities.
aiModels.useCase: Health apps can warn users about poor air quality days.

aiModels.name: InventoryAI Retail
aiModels.shortDescription: Inventory optimization for small retailers.
aiModels.fullDescription: Demand forecasting and inventory optimization for small retail shops. Works with limited historical data.
aiModels.useCase: Small shop owners can reduce stockouts and overstock situations.

aiModels.name: RemitPredict Flow
aiModels.shortDescription: Remittance flow prediction for financial planning.
aiModels.fullDescription: Predicts remittance inflows at household and regional levels. Helps families and businesses plan for expected transfers.
aiModels.useCase: Financial service providers can offer products timed with remittance cycles.

aiModels.name: DroughtEarly Warning
aiModels.shortDescription: Early warning system for drought conditions.
aiModels.fullDescription: Satellite-based drought prediction model. Provides 2-3 month advance warning for agricultural planning.
aiModels.useCase: Governments and NGOs can prepare drought response before conditions worsen.

aiModels.name: SchoolDrop Predictor
aiModels.shortDescription: Early warning for student dropout risk.
aiModels.fullDescription: Identifies students at risk of dropping out based on attendance patterns, grades, and socioeconomic indicators.
aiModels.useCase: Schools can intervene early with at-risk students.

aiModels.name: TBScreen Radiology
aiModels.shortDescription: Automated TB detection from chest X-rays.
aiModels.fullDescription: Deep learning model for tuberculosis screening from chest X-ray images. Designed for high-volume screening programs.
aiModels.useCase: TB screening programs can process more patients with limited radiologist availability.

aiModels.name: MarketConnect Match
aiModels.shortDescription: Connecting smallholder farmers to buyers.
aiModels.fullDescription: Matching algorithm connecting smallholder farmers with buyers based on produce type, quality, quantity, and location.
aiModels.useCase: Agricultural marketplaces can efficiently match supply with demand.

studies.title: AI Readiness in African Startups
studies.description: Comprehensive survey of AI adoption barriers and opportunities across 8 African countries.
keyFindings: 72% of startups lack access to quality training data
Cost of cloud computing is top barrier
Healthcare and agriculture show highest AI potential

studies.title: Data Governance Frameworks for African AI
studies.description: Analysis of data protection regulations and their impact on AI development across the continent.
keyFindings: Only 28 African countries have data protection laws
GDPR-style regulations emerging in key markets

studies.title: Women in African AI: Landscape Analysis
studies.description: Survey of women founders and practitioners in the African AI ecosystem.
keyFindings: Women represent 22% of AI practitioners in surveyed countries
Funding gap persists for women-led AI startups

studies.title: Open Source AI Models: Impact Assessment
studies.description: Evaluation of the adoption and impact of open-source AI models released through the program.
keyFindings: 24 models released with 15,000+ GitHub stars combined

finalReport.title: AI4Startups Program Final Report
finalReport.description: Comprehensive report on the AI4Startups initiative outcomes, learnings, and recommendations for future programs.
